title: Infant Vaccine Quiz
description: A pregnant woman passes antibodies to her unborn baby through the placenta to protect against certain diseases. How long does this natural immunity last?
cleaned_text: Test your knowledge of vaccines against a variety of diseases that can affect your child. This quiz is based on information from the CDC. Francesca Torriani, MD Medical Director, Infection Prevention and Clinical Epidemiology 619-471-9045 UC San Diego | School of Medicine
